title.text: A Default First Order Family Weight Determination Procedure for WPDV Models

entities.text: Default First Order Family Weight Determination Procedure

abstractContent.text: Weighted Probability Distribution Voting (WPDV) is a newly designed machine learning algorithm, for which research is currently aimed at the determination of good weighting schemes.
This paper describes a simple yet effective weight determination procedure, which leads to models that can produce competitive results fora number of NLP classification tasks.
